extendedInfo.description: Trophy checklist for Need for Speed Most Wanted on the PS3, to keep track of your progress towards Platinum.. All 61 Trophies included. This includes the trophies from the Ultimate Speed Pack, Terminal Velocity Pack, Movie Legends Pack and NFS Heroes Pack DLC.. Descriptions for all 61 Trophies. Your trophy progress is automatically saved when a checkbox is pressed.. Your trophy progress is automatically loaded when you relaunch the application. The Trophy description is shown when a row is pressedDisclaimerThis is an unofficial educational guide created by Dev4WebApps. All trademarks and copyrights referenced are the property of their respective owners and are used under the fair use doctrine. Dev4WebApps and this application are in no way affiliated with Electronic Arts or Criterion Games.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Works great for me. Now I can see what trophies to aim for while playing.
reviews.author: A Google User
